availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Williams Reid in Morgan County, Kentucky, on September 11, 1826. Farmer in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Magoffin County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Magoffin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 164B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 501.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, p. 476A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film 000839918, p. 6.
